General.Name: independent capital AG
General.Description: independent capital AG operates as a consulting and investment company in Germany. It offers corporate financial services, such as structured corporate and growth financing, merger and acquisition, MBO's, and corporate succession services, as well as manages corporate investments. The company also provides advisory services for medium-sized companies on equity and debt markets; and invests in companies operating in mid and small cap segment. independent capital AG is based in Stuttgart, Germany.
